Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.scenes.utils

Class Refiner

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.scenes.utils.Refiner
public class Refiner
extends java.lang.Object
Brief utility class usable to refine in an easy and clean way various Region's aspects ranging from size to style. It uses Binder and CSS to perform such tasks.
See Also:
Region, Binder, CSS
